title: Barb-tail harpoon

properties.name: description
properties.value: A barb-tail harpoon is a weapon obtained after successfully trapping a barb-tailed kebbit, which requires 33 Hunter to catch. It also can be used as a harpoon in Fishing. Its ability to be wielded makes it a more convenient option for fishers as it saves one inventory space.

Item ID10129

A barb-tail harpoon is a weapon obtained after successfully trapping a barb-tailed kebbit, which requires 33 Hunter to catch. It also can be used as a harpoon in Fishing. Its ability to be wielded makes it a more convenient option for fishers as it saves one inventory space.

[[File:Barb-tail harpoon detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''barb-tail harpoon''' is a [[Weapons|weapon]] obtained after successfully trapping a [[barb-tailed kebbit]], which requires 33 [[Hunter]] to catch. It also can be used as a [[harpoon]] in [[Fishing]]. Its ability to be wielded makes it a more convenient option for fishers as it saves one [[inventory]] space.
